p.strong: The Parish is committed to providing updated information regarding COVID19 in our community. We are in close partnership with our state and local partners and the Department of Homeland Security to stay informed.
For complete information on COVID19 in our area, please visit the Caddo Parish Department of Homeland Security at:
Please click here for the Caddo Parish Sheriff’s web page
Please click here for the City of Shreveport’s web page
Please click here to view the CDC Coronavirus information
Please click here to view the Louisiana Deparment of Health information
Please click here for SBA Disaster Relief information for Louisiana residents

div.p: SBA Information - Coronavirus (COVID-19): Small Business Guidance & Loan Resources

p.strong: Please click here for unemployment information from the Louisiana Workforce Commission
